section.name: Building Fulcrum
section.p: Building Fulcrum from CVS is now very easy because it has been Maven-enabled. Before you begin, you'll need to check out the jakarta-turbine-fulcrum CVS repository (if you are not familiar with the Jakarta CVS repositories, please refer to the documentation). In addition, you'll also have to check out the jakarta-turbine-torque repository because the current build process references templates in that source directory. Note: both repositories should be checked out in the same top-level directory.
Please refer to the Maven Getting Started document for instructions on how to build the project using Maven.
